title: RP for mastering champions
body: So some people (like me) Don't like spending money on games... So maybe there could be rp for mastering champions or getting a "S"

replies.body:
The process of mastering a champion is already going to get you free stuff through crafting. 
Have you forgotten that league is run by a business? That they have to pay people to create the content that you want for free?
U have a point but hextech chests barely have anything. So if I got a key fragment that means 2 more to go. Sad. Hextech chests should include like 3 shards instead of one.

> [{quoted}](name=Epixragequit,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=qAEjh53K,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2016-08-27T06:04:05.913+0000)
>
> U have a point but hextech chests barely have anything. So if I got a key fragment that means 2 more to go. Sad. Hextech chests should include like 3 shards instead of one.

"include like 3 shards instead of 1" they dont come with any, you earn them by being good. Not paring with someone who is good

???????

I mean champion/skin shards?
Not key shards?
My last chest gave me pulse fire ezreal. I wouldn't call that barely anything
U so lucky. Ive only opened 2 chests lol. Both had ward skins. WARD SKINS R USELESS EVEN IF U WARD A LOT.

Weird, about the key fragment thing.

I haven't got a key fragment in about 25 games.

You have to win the game to get a chance at a key frag.

>
> You have to win the game to get a chance at a key frag.

What's the chance exactly? I just won like 7-8 games in a row today but no key fragments.
Im pretty sure u meant to get a good kdr like 999999999999/ 28432979875892543/ -000000000
You already get free shit for getting S rank and mastering champs
Good luck with this request ðŸ˜‚
